title: 2015년 Shimomura 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Shimomura. 판결일: 2015-12-29. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Tsutomu SHIMOMURA, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. Kendra CARLSON, an Agent of the Transportation Security Administration, in Her Individual Capacity; Wade Davis, a Denver Police Department Officer, in His Individual Capacity, Defendants-Appellees, and Terry Cates, an Agent of the Transportation Security Administration, in Her Individual Capacity; Patti Zeller, an Agent of the Transportation Security Administration, in Her Individual Capacity, Defendants
**판결일**: 2015-12-29
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Bacharach, Murphy, Tymkovich

## 변호인

Ty Gee, Haddon, (Laura G. Kastetter, with him on the briefs) Haddon, Morgan, and Foreman, P.C., Denver, CO, for Plaintiff-Appellant., Paul Farley, Assistant United States Attorney, (John F. Walsh, United States Attorney, with him on the brief) Office of the United States Attorney, Denver, CO, for Kendra Carlson, Defendant-Appellee., Andrew J. Carafelli, Pryor Johnson Carney Karr Nixon, P.C., Denver, CO, for Wade Davis, Defendant-Appellee.

## 인용

- 811 F.3d 349
